contest-event.event-date: April 23, 1967 D Durham League Contest (Section B) Durham League Contest (Section B) 20 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-b The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Schubert's Symphony in C Community Hall, Pelton Fell, County Durham 8 bands competed. Prizes - 1st £18 and cup, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5. 8 bands competed.
